modal.description: To connect your Medium account, you need to get an integration token.
modal.description2: You can get it by following the instructions below.
modal.step1: Go to Medium settings –> "Security and Apps" –> "Integration tokens".
modal.step2: Copy the integration token and paste it to the field below.
modal.saved: Integration with Medium was successfully established.
